publisher.publisher-name: Graduate Faculty of Political and Social Science, New School for Social Research

subj-group.subject: What Does It Mean for a Community to Have a Memory?

title-group.article-title: The Ciphered Transits of Collective Memory: Neo-Freudian Impressions
